docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Sept. 27 -- A new course for the Uruguayan economy is charted in an exchange reform bill that has been submitted to Congress. The bill envisages one free convertible rate for the peso in place of controlled exchange.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Sept. 27 -- A new course for the Uruguayan economy is charted in an exchange reform bill that has been submitted to Congress. The bill envisages one free convertible rate for the peso in place of controlled exchange.
docs.abstract: drafts austerity program with peso devaluation as 1st step; living costs rise, other problems discussed

headline.main: URUGUAY DRAFTS AUSTERITY PLAN; Peso Devaluation Scheduled as First Step -- Single Free Rate Proposed

byline.original: By JUAN de ONISSpecial to The New York Times

docs.snippet: A nation, like an individual, can sometimes be its own worst enemy. That grand little democracy of Uruguay is now showing how blithely it can coast downhill to an economic crash that is quite unnecessary. Political intrigues, petty quarrels, party...
docs.lead_paragraph: A nation, like an individual, can sometimes be its own worst enemy. That grand little democracy of Uruguay is now showing how blithely it can coast downhill to an economic crash that is quite unnecessary. Political intrigues, petty quarrels, party and personal maneuvering have been blocking economic and fiscal measures that could straighten out national problems quickly and without much austerity.

docs.snippet: DUCK hunters along the Atlantic flyway will feel no happier after hearing about how their sport is conducted, and with what results, in Uruguay. On this flyway hunters are limited to either three or four ducks, according to the area, and they might...
docs.lead_paragraph: DUCK hunters along the Atlantic flyway will feel no happier after hearing about how their sport is conducted, and with what results, in Uruguay. On this flyway hunters are limited to either three or four ducks, according to the area, and they might have trouble getting that many.

headline.main: Wood, Field and Stream; Duck Hunting Experiences in Uruguay Strain Credulity, if Not Conscience

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Oct. 15 -- In the area that extends from Pernambuco down around Cape Horn and up the West Coast to the Isthmus of Panama, Uruguay is now the South American country best equipped to deal with the important operations of marine...
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Oct. 15 -- In the area that extends from Pernambuco down around Cape Horn and up the West Coast to the Isthmus of Panama, Uruguay is now the South American country best equipped to deal with the important operations of marine salvage. So says Comdr. J. N. Bathurst, a Canadian expert, who had much to do with making it that way.
docs.abstract: Comdr Bathurst sees Uruguay best-equipped nation for salvage work in Latin Amer; discusses training mission under UN auspices; illus

headline.main: Uruguay Rated as Tops in Area In Marine Salvage Techniques

byline.original: By KATHLEEN McLAUGHLINSpecial to The New York Times
